task_description: Integrate comprehensive dictionary validation for user-submitted words.
requirements: Select and integrate a reliable dictionary API (such as Free Dictionary API or Merriam-Webster Dictionary API) or a comprehensive local dictionary dataset.
Implement efficient lookup logic to validate user-submitted words against the dictionary.
Ensure submitted words contain the mandatory central letter provided in puzzleData.
Reject invalid submissions clearly and informatively in the user interface.
Update game state only when valid words are submitted.
Include clear inline documentation and comments to explain the implemented validation logic.
success_criteria: All valid English words containing the center letter are correctly recognized.
All invalid or incorrectly formed words (e.g., missing center letter, non-English words) are consistently rejected.
No significant performance degradation when checking words against the dictionary.
Clear and user-friendly error messages displayed upon invalid submissions.
deliverables: Updated and tested code integrated into App.tsx and related components.
Brief technical documentation explaining the choice of dictionary API/dataset and integration method.
Passing unit and integration tests demonstrating validation logic correctness.
